title: News24.com | International Covid-19 update | Trump calls to 'liberate' states, 1,046 cases on French aircraft carrier

content:
Here are the latest developments in the coronavirus crisis:
- Trump calls to 'liberate' states -
US President Donald Trump issues calls to "liberate" Michigan, Minnesota and Virginia in a series of tweets, which are quickly rebuked by the Democratic leaders… [+2222 chars]
